name: Dejavu (Oswald33)
description:
Team: Yichao Ma (Axi), Yuxiao Wang, Zeduo Ouyang (Oswald), Zhenyi Wei

This is a 2D roguelike game make with Unity as an assignment project during my UC Santa Cruz Games & Playable Media graduate program. 

In this game, you can play up to four different characters, beating enemies to get stronger, and try to find the truth behind the world.
